channel.title: Need help some one got anti-syipkpker
channel.description:
i need help noob keep spamming i got 45players online they keep spamming i want to get anti-syipkpker or anti-spamm i tryied that turor 1ip per connection i fail at it i am not very good coder
any one got any way to stop them please????

item.title: Need help some one got anti-syipkpker
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

[quote=“abdelwassa, post:4, topic:322864”]they keep changing ip and name i just need something to block them[/quote] im maybe stupid but u can always add another letter in ur server ip like death-scapee.no-ip.biz
then the syipker wont have a clue to see ur server ip

Read full topic
item.source: Need help some one got anti-syipkpker

item.title: Need help some one got anti-syipkpker
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

that dosent always work… sometimes they just change their ip… i had the same problem too…

try selecting their accounts and renaming them 3lkjafldjalfj
or something like that… it usualy screwes around with the bots
